---
title: "16 - Plot a bar plot for any 2 variables in your dataset"
author: "Muhammed Aqib Arif Ahamed"
date: '2022-04-08'
output: pdf_document
---

```{r load-packages, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)
library(knitr)
```

```{r}
vgsales <- read.csv("vgsales.csv")
```

```{r}
data <- vgsales
data$Critic_Score <- as.factor(data$Critic_Score)
data$Total_Shipped <- as.factor(data$Total_Shipped) 
data %ï¼ž% ggplot(aes(x = Critic_Score, y = Total_Shipped)) + geom_bar()
```
